wiki.text:
'Familiar' may refer to:

*Familiarity, an intimate relationship *Familiar spirit, supernatural entities
believed to assist witches and cunning folk in their practice of magic
*Familiar Linux, Linux distribution for iPAQ machines and other PDAs *T–V
distinction, contrast between second-person pronouns that are specialized for
varying levels of familiarity *''The Familiar'' (film), 2009 film *''The
Familiar'' (Animorphs), 41st book in the Animorphs series *''The Familiars''
(novel), a series of children's fantasy books *''The Familiars'' (film),
forthcoming 2014 film
